evidence.text:
Person A: What do you think? This slut's killing me. I can't live just knowing she's out there... with someone else. So, now I'm here, with you.
Person A: Believe me, I want to, but we're going through a divorce right now and I'd be the number one suspect. So, I need the perfect front, the perfect alibi.
Person A: What's it to you? I forgot to mention, it might be a twofer. She's got this new boyfriend... a real douche.
Person A: And, if he's there, you can take him out too.
Person A: When you do it, I want her to know why. Right before you do it, look her in the eye and say "this is from your loving husband." I want that to be the last thing she fuckin' hears.
